name: SWARM OF RAVENS
size_type_alignment: Medium Swarm of Tiny Beasts, Unaligned

traits.name: Swarm
traits.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny raven. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

actions.name: Beaks
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage, or 2 (1d4) Piercing damage if the swarm is Bloodied.

actions.name: Cacophony (Recharge 6)
actions.text: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 10, one creature in the swarm's space. Failure: The target has the Deafened condition until the start of the swarm's next turn. While Deafened, the target also has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls. Her eyes are everywhere-flecks of carbonado, pools of midnight. The Raven Queen watches. -EVERNIGHT
